Posts.Content: Flamingolover wrote: I am 61 and was recently diagnoised (routine mammogram)Â with DCIS, ER-/PR- and am still waiting to find out about HER2. Does that take longer to return from Pathologist? I am acheduled for a mastectomy on January 26 (my choice not to have lumpectomy). I would love to have all the facts prior to surgery. Does the appointment with the oncologist usually follow the surgery. I assume if I end up being triple negative it will mean chemo also. Any input will be greatly appreciated! Dx 12/27/2010, DCIS, Grade 3, ER-/PR- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: DCIS ER-/PR- HER2unknown Flamingolover Beesie
